questions.question: If an object is to stay in equilibrium under three forces,
answers: the resultant force of two forces should be in the same direction as that of the remaining force.
the resultant force of the three forces should be zero.
the three forces should be coplanar.
the lines of action of the three forces should meet at the same point.
questions.correct_answer: the resultant force of the three forces should be zero.

The typical cell is
